shadow.name: GREED
shadow.description: The shadow frequency of The Marrying Maiden, expressing through greed

gift.name: ASPIRATION
gift.description: The gift frequency of The Marrying Maiden, expressing through aspiration

siddhi.name: ASCENSION
siddhi.description: The siddhi frequency of The Marrying Maiden, expressing through ascension

inversion_protocols.script: This is Gate 54 shadow frequency. The greed you're experiencing is a distortion of your natural aspiration. Through awareness and experimentation, you can shift from greed to aspiration.
inversion_protocols.somatic_anchor: Feel into your root. Notice the sensation of greed.

experiment.hypothesis: If I work with Gate 54 consciously for 7 days, the greed pattern will shift toward aspiration.
experiment.action: Daily practice working with Gate 54 energy.

success_criteria.target: Noticeable shift from greed toward aspiration
